statements: SELECT * FROM project_progress;
SELECT project_id, project_name, status FROM project_progress WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_progress WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_id, assigned_to FROM project_progress WHERE assigned_to IS NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, status FROM project_progress ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, status FROM project_progress WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, assigned_to FROM project_progress WHERE assigned_to = 'John Smith' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline FROM project_progress WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, assigned_to FROM project_progress WHERE status = 'In Progress' AND start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE status = 'Not Started' ORDER BY project_id ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage FROM project_progress WHERE end_date < '2022-08-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM project_progress WHERE project_name LIKE 'Project%' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM deadlines WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY deadline_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage, end_date FROM project_progress WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND progress_percentage < 100;
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage FROM project_progress WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE progress_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage, deadline_date FROM project_progress INNER JOIN deadlines ON project_progress.project_id = deadlines.project_id;
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage, deadline_date FROM project_progress INNER JOIN deadlines ON project_progress.project_id = deadlines.project_id WHERE deadline_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS project_duration_days FROM project_progress WHERE progress_percentage = 100;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description, status FROM tasks;
SELECT member_name, email, role FROM team_members;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress'
SELECT member_name, email, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer'
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_deadline > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT task_name, task_status, task_deadline FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'in-progress';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks ORDER BY task_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_deadline > NOW() ORDER BY project_deadline DESC;
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_status FROM projects INNER JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM projects LEFT JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_tasks > 5;
SELECT user_name, task_name, task_deadline FROM users u JOIN user_tasks ut ON u.user_id = ut.user_id JOIN tasks t ON ut.task_id = t.task_id ORDER BY task_deadline ASC, user_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM tasks WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT assignee_name FROM task_assignees WHERE task_id = 'b1eabe57-3b6a-4d16-a7e8-13ebab7bd2a2';
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text, comment_date FROM task_comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, status FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT assignee_name FROM task_assignees WHERE assignee_id IN (SELECT assignee_id FROM task_assignees WHERE task_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT t.task_name, tc.commenter_name, tc.comment_text FROM tasks t INNER JOIN task_comments tc ON t.task_id = tc.task_id WHERE t.status = 'Completed';
